title: Bug 122105: Schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure
description: When using a stored procedure, the schema should be added in the format of 'schemaname.Procedurename'. Currently, it is not being added correctly.
OB: The schema is not being included when using a stored procedure.
EB: The schema name and procedure name should be in the format of 'schemaname.Procedurename'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Create a data source.
2. Create a data set using the stored procedure.
